cogwheel0/luci-mobile

Manage multiple OpenWrt routers from a Flutter app

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • OpenWrt fork with more device support and features for routers
  • Linux-based OS for customizing routers and embedded devices
  • Multi-platform app for desktop, mobile, and web
  • Handles offline and online connectivity in Flutter
  • Jellyfin media frontend built with Flutter
  • VPN application built with Flutter
  • Cross-platform Flutter app for interfacing with LLM models locally and remotely
  • Multi-modal trip planner for public transportation
  • Manages routers through Home Assistant dashboard
  • zero trust networking for apps, mesh overlay, smart routing, sdk support
